attributes.action: Cyclists should have insurance to cycle on the road.
attributes.additional_details: I want parliament to put in place a law that states that if cyclists want to use a public highway, they should be fully insured.
attributes.background: I want parliament to discuss whether cyclists should have insurance to cycle on a public highway, just the same as every other road user must have.

rejection.details:
We're not sure if you want Parliament to debate whether cyclists should have insurance, or the Government to introduce a law requiring them to do so.

In any case, we already have a petition open calling for a very similar action, which you might like to sign:

Require cyclists have lights, license plate and insurance to use the roads: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/604266
